title: Australian model Georgia Gibbs plays Niall Horan's one night stand in a seductive music video
text:
She's the Australian model who was recently spotted filming a music video with a former One Direction member.

And on Friday, Georgia Gibbs starred as Niall Horan's one night stand in a music video for his new single Nice to Meet Ya.

Right at the start of the clip, the 24-year-old stunner stepped out of the 26-year-old singer's London home in a metallic silver dress, suggesting she had spent the night.

Nice to meet ya! Australian model Georgia Gibbs (right) plays Niall Horan's (left) one night stand in a seductive music video

Wild night? Right at the start of the clip, the 24-year-old stunner stepped out of the 26-year-old singer's London home in a metallic silver dress, suggesting she had spent the night

Georgia appeared to go braless in the bold number and slipped on her transparent heels before beaming as she walked away from lavish home.

Niall watches the beauty strut away before saying: 'She's not very good at this, she's left her phone behind!'

The video appears to be filmed in one shot, tracking the Irish singer as he walks through the streets of London.

Awkward! Niall watches the beauty strut away before saying: 'She's not very good at this, she's left her phone behind!'

Making a statement! Georgia appeared to go braless in the bold number and slipped on her transparent heels before beaming as she walked away from lavish home.

Georgia looked angelic in her second appearance, wearing an all white outfit of jeans, boots and a crop top with wings on her back.

'When the morning comes, I know you won't be there,' Niall sings as the Perth-born beauty hops in a taxi and drives away.

The end of the video shows how Niall and Georgia met in a swanky London bar the night before.

Nice to Meet Ya is the second single from

Channeling her inner Victoria's Secret angel? Georgia looked angelic in her second appearance, wearing an all white outfit of jeans, boots and a crop top with wings on her back

Nice to meet ya! While Niall hits the bar with his lads, Georgia approaches in the same metallic silver dress and the pair shake hands

While Niall hits the bar with his lads, Georgia approaches in the same metallic silver dress and the pair shake hands.

However, while the Irish singer and his squad are doing shots, the camera pans back to reveal the metallic model has already left, leaving her number behind.

Georgia shared a photo on the music video set captioned, 'hey Niall Horan, nice to meet ya', referencing the song name.
description: She's the Australian model who was recently spotted filming a music video with a former One Direction member.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
